name: Gatti Volanti
description:
Team Name: Volumento

CONTROLS

Key board [E] projectile - Player 1

Key board [P] projectile - Player 2

GamePad [LB] projectile - Player 1

GamePad [RB] projectile - Player 2

The context of the game begins by placing us in Venice Italy, with a homely cat enjoying his food on the balcony, when one of the fish bones that he throws hits a stray cat that was rummaging through in the trash, unleashing a battle of throwing objects in the middle of the city.

List any content that was created before the jam.

All materials from megascans, water material, Bird and Fireflies

Link to Gameplay Footage

https://youtu.be/aWGBWVvb2OM
